recipes.name: Classic Pancakes
steps: In a large bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder, salt and sugar.
Make a well in the center and pour in the milk, egg and melted butter.
Mix until smooth.
Heat a lightly oiled griddle or frying pan over medium-high heat.
Pour or scoop the batter onto the griddle, using approximately 1/4 cup for each pancake.
Brown on both sides and serve hot.

recipes.name: Avocado Toast
steps: Toast the bread slices until golden brown.
Mash the avocado in a bowl with lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the avocado mixture evenly on the toasted bread.
Top with red pepper flakes if desired.
Optional: Add a fried or poached egg on top.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Berry Smoothie Bowl
steps: Add frozen bananas, berries, yogurt, almond milk, and honey to a blender.
Blend until smooth and thick.
Pour into bowls.
Top with granola, fresh berries, and chia seeds.
Serve immediately with a spoon.

recipes.name: Grilled Chicken Salad
steps: Season chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and olive oil.
Grill chicken over medium-high heat for 6-7 minutes per side until cooked through.
Let chicken rest for 5 minutes, then slice.
In a large bowl, combine salad greens, tomatoes, cucumber, and red onion.
Add sliced chicken on top.
Sprinkle with feta cheese.
Drizzle with balsamic vinaigrette and serve.

recipes.name: Caesar Wrap
steps: Lay tortillas flat on a clean surface.
Spread Caesar dressing on each tortilla.
Add lettuce, grilled chicken, parmesan cheese, croutons, and tomatoes.
Fold in the sides and roll tightly.
Cut in half diagonally and serve.

recipes.name: Caprese Sandwich
steps: Slice the ciabatta bread in half lengthwise.
Drizzle olive oil on both sides of the bread.
Layer tomato slices, mozzarella, and basil leaves.
Season with salt and pepper.
Drizzle with balsamic glaze.
Close the sandwich, cut into portions, and serve.

recipes.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
ingredients: Salt and black pepper to taste
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package directions. Reserve 1 cup pasta water.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
Add garlic and cook for 1 minute.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs and parmesan cheese.
Drain pasta and add to the pan with pancetta.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture, adding pasta water to create a creamy sauce.
Season with salt and pepper.
Garnish with parsley and serve immediately.

recipes.name: Grilled Salmon with Vegetables
ingredients: 1 red bell pepper, cut into chunks
1 yellow bell pepper, cut into chunks
steps: Preheat grill to medium-high heat.
Season salmon fillets with salt, pepper, and dill.
Toss vegetables with olive oil, garlic, salt, and pepper.
Place salmon skin-side down on the grill.
Add vegetables to the grill.
Grill salmon for 4-5 minutes per side.
Grill vegetables until tender and slightly charred.
Serve salmon with grilled vegetables and lemon slices.

recipes.name: Beef Tacos
steps: Brown ground beef in a large skillet over medium heat.
Drain excess fat.
Add taco seasoning and water according to package directions.
Simmer for 5 minutes until thickened.
Warm taco shells according to package directions.
Fill each shell with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, salsa, onions, and cilantro.
Serve immediately.

recipes.name: Chicken Stir Fry
steps: Heat vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add chicken and stir-fry until golden and cooked through, about 5 minutes.
Remove chicken and set aside.
Add garlic and ginger, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add vegetables and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes until tender-crisp.
Return chicken to the pan.
Add soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil.
Toss everything together for 1-2 minutes.
Garnish with sesame seeds and serve over rice.
